response.overview: The 1950s dominate in this assortment of films, starting with a pair of outdoor pieces and then a jewel starring the “Marilyn Monroe of Burlesque”, Dixie Evans. Feminine Forms showcases stripper Shasta Rose in every man’s dream combo—hard at work in the kitchen, and naked. Next, a brunette bookworm tries to compensate for that stereotype, followed by a quartet posing by an elegant pool in Sex-Sational. Stunningly-abled Cherry Knight wows the crowd in the punningly-labeled California Grapefruit, after which a procession of color Artist’s Models films continue the 1950s theme with studio posing and the occasional field trip to Corriganville, seaside mansions, or the ubiquitous California rock gardens. A varied series of 1960s loops closes out the action in afro and big-hair style.
response.title: Nudie Cuties: Volume 7
